Package org.cleverbus.core.common.directcall

Classes for making direct calls to external systems via sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context and then to external system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DirectCall Contract for calling external system with assistance of internal route.
DirectCallRegistry Contract of registry calls between sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context.
 

Class Summary
DirectCallHttpImpl Implementation of DirectCall interface with HTTP client that calls DirectCallWsRoute.
DirectCallParams Encapsulates parameters for direct call.
DirectCallRegistryMemoryImpl Memory implementation of DirectCallRegistry interface.
DirectCallWsRoute Route that can directly call specified web service URI via specified WS sender.
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.common.directcall Description

Classes for making direct calls to external systems via sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context and then to external system.

See Also:
DirectCall
